attributes.action: Make all food producers declare Trans Fat on the list of ingrediants
attributes.additional_details: We want all food producers to list Trans Fat useage on their product.  There is a proven link between Trans Fat and chronic heart desease.  This hydrolised fat is totally unnessesary.  It cause many people to have stomach proplems but is hidden by the food producers.  It is about time we followed the example of the USA where in many areas its useage is banned.
